name: Over Shot
description:
PITCH
This game was created as part of the Ubisoft Game Jam 2020. 

HOW TO PLAY
In this action game you will have to provide your neighbours with essential items and what better way to do that other than with a slingshot. Perfectly conform with social distancing. Fetch the requested items from your apartment and return to your balcony to send them over. 

CONTROLS
Walking: W+A+S+D
Running: Hold Shift
Picking up items: LMB
Drop item: LMB onto the environment
Draw Slingshot: W+S
Shooting: Spacebar
Aim Slingshot up/down: Q+E
Aim Slingshot left/right: A+D
